text.page:
501
102-251a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ga Na ba ti hr-i da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

502
102-251b rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung bo'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang la la tshogs kyi bdag po tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'dzin na de'i las thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzung bas dgos pa 'grub cing gsang sngags thams cad kyang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ na mo stu te ma hA ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ oM ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra/ bi da ra/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ staM b+ha staM b+ha/ dzaM b+ha dzaM b+ha/ mo ha mo ha/ de hi de hi/ dA pa ya dA pa ya/ d+hA na d+hA n+ya sid+d+hiM me pra yats+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ma hA ru dra ba tsa nI ye swA hA/ oM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM tu ru tu ru swA hA/ oM mu ru mu ru swA hA/ oM pA pa shAn+ti ba su puSh+Ti+iM ku ru swA hA/ ad+gu ta bin+du k+tsa b+hi ta tsit+ta ma hA bi dA raHsa mA gats+tsha ti ma hA b+ha ya/ ma hA ba la/ ma hA ba ra kra ma/ ma sA ha sti/ ma hA dak+Shi Ni ya bra cod ya ma swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ oM ga ga ga ga ga ga ga gaH/ oM na mo na maHswA hA/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig tshogs kyi bdag po tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'di rtsom zhing gsang sngags sgrub pa/ dkon mchog gsum mchod du yul gzhan du 'gro'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la me tog dang bdug pas mchod pa byas te/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'di bklags na las thams cad 'grub kyis 'di la the tshom ma za zhig /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug dang / yul 'khrugs pa thams cad kyi nang du yang dran par byas na thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du nang

503
102-252a par langs nas tshig tu bton na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis mdangs 'phrog par mi 'gyur zhing thag ring por yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po rdzogs s+ho//
